name: politico
text:
Biden was just about the last Democrat progressives wanted as the nominee.

But now that he’s the one taking on Trump, they’re working harder to put him in office than they did for Hillary Clinton — and they're planning to give him hell the minute he wins https://t.co/TE9Ezyl0Xv

name: politico
text: The University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill is ending in-person instruction for undergrads just a week after reopening after dozens of students living in dorms and a fraternity house tested positive for #COVID19 https://t.co/qAKytTPGLB

name: politico
text:
A few more things we're watching tonight:
• Michelle Obama's speech
• How Bernie Sanders' speech differs from 4 years ago
• Joe Biden's racial justice conversation (it's uncommon to see the soon-to-be nominee on the first night)

More live analysis: https://t.co/b05DYRNlNf

name: politico
text: The DNC begins. Speaking tonight: Michelle Obama, Bernie Sanders, Republican John Kasich and more. Live analysis: https://t.co/Yf4BFttio1 https://t.co/VSJDrvtpCE

name: politico
text:
Obama's 2004 “Purple America” speech was, in part, so great because you could feel the electricity of the crowd, says reporter @MarcACaputo. That's gone this year. 

Will it be possible to reproduce a moment like that virtually? 

(Live analysis: https://t.co/Yf4BFtbHwt)

name: politico
text: President Trump wanted to shut off emergency relief for California amid devastating wildfires because it was a blue state, and he tried to deliberately separate families to deter immigration, according to a former administration official https://t.co/nEB9mVh9bo

name: politico
text:
George Floyd's brothers spoke at the DNC tonight. The address was followed by a moment of silence for Floyd and other victims of police violence. #DNCConvention

More live analysis: https://t.co/Yf4BFttio1 https://t.co/m4pUSyl90z

name: politico
text: RT @SallyGold: It sums up a lot about @NYGovCuomo & @NYCMayor that despite both having problems w/ their COVID responses - Cuomo w/ nursing homes, BDB w/ his health dept - Cuomo has a fairly prominent #DNC2020 speaking slot and BDB earlier today said he forgot it was this week.It sums up a lot about @NYGovCuomo & @NYCMayor that despite both having problems w/ their COVID responses - Cuomo w… https://t.co/XkY3IhIp56

name: politico
text: RT @ddiamond: Here’s the Obama-Biden “pandemic playbook” that Eva Longoria just mentioned at the DNC, via @nahaltoosi and me this spring. https://t.co/HbpTMGbyiv

name: politico
text: A federal judge decided to temporarily block an Idaho law that bars transgender women from participating in school sports and requires testing if an athlete’s sex is in question https://t.co/zulbDuGiF0

name: politico
text: Joe Biden says he contemplated suicide following the 1972 car crash that killed his wife and daughter, opening up about his personal encounters with loss in pre-released clips on Monday from an upcoming documentary https://t.co/ixAG6BpWvD

name: politico
text:
Urquiza previously told @lbarronlopez: "I worked really hard to try and save [him] and I couldn't...that's why I'm angry. I would be processing this completely different if the circumstances surrounding the leadership & policy decisions had been different"
https://t.co/owkPZKNlpL

name: politico
text: The Democratic National Convention has a distinctly different feel this year, with the #Covid pandemic pushing it to a virtual affair that lacks raucous crowds, behind-the-scenes dealmaking and the general pizzazz of a political celebration https://t.co/dPmuKoV4px

name: politico
text:
The opening night featured a moment of silence for George Floyd, the Black man killed by Minneapolis police in May.

Floyd's brother commended the protests against racial injustice as a fitting tribute and listed the names of others killed by police https://t.co/dPmuKoV4px

name: politico
text: A Virginia state senator has been charged with damaging a Confederate monument in Portsmouth during protests that also led to a demonstrator being critically injured when a statue was torn down https://t.co/V7n4qjpkBc
